description: A person plays a racing video game on a monitor, steering through turns and following the race track closely.
The player accelerates along a straight section of the race track, shifts up through gears, and is approached and overtaken by a red car on the left.
The player continues through a right turn, shifting gears and accelerating as buildings and colored curbs pass by on the left.
The player continues accelerating while taking a long right turn on the virtual race track, shifting gears and moving the car onto a straight section.
The car in the game approaches the edge of the track, steering closer to the red-and-green striped curb.
